page.title: 01LANDSCAPE OF FORFAR
page.content: {Location}Forfar is a lively town which sits in the Stathmore Valley.It has a thriving community which is growing all the time.Its history goes back to the Picts.{Background}Forfar is a great place for industry and development.It has grown greatly in the past 25 years.New companies have started in Forfar & spread to other towns.A lot of tourists come to Forfar for a bit of peace and quiet.They can enjoy sailing and other water sports at Forfar Loch.New housing developments are always being built to house families in Forfar.{Interests The town has made itself known for its famous Bridies which are made by bakers throughout the town.The town's football team Forfar Athletic launched their centenary season in the first division and are looking forward to the modernisation of the ground.
